encounter_summary: Deceased donor kidney transplant, immediate post-op ICU monitoring
POD#1 nephrology progress, urine output improving, diuresis managed
1-week clinic visit, labs reviewed, incision healing
3-week clinic visit, BK/CMV baseline PCRs, blood pressure titration
5-week clinic visit, CMV PCR monitoring, antihypertensive adjustment
9-week clinic visit, DSA screen negative, ultrasound stable
3-month surveillance biopsy, pathology benign, follow-up arranged
